### Invitation to Qualify for Contract: CCTV and Intrusion Alarm System

#### Project Title and Identification
* **English Title**: EQ754-241913 Gordie Howe International Bridge–CCTV and Intrusion Alarm System–Phase 1
* **French Title**: EQ754-241913 Pont international Gordie-Howe–Télévision en circuit fermé et système d'alarme anti-intrusion-Phase 1

#### Contract Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4655334116
* **Publication Date**: 26 June 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: 11 July 2024 at 14:00 ET
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Status**: Closed to new submissions

#### Contract Description
This tender is for the provision of a security-related CCTV Video Surveillance System (VSS) and Intrusion Alarm System for the Canadian Border Services Agency (CBSA) site at the Gordie Howe International Bridge location in Windsor, Ontario.

The procurement process will consist of two phases. The first phase will evaluate the qualification of all interested suppliers. The second phase will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

#### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria
Eligible suppliers must demonstrate the necessary expertise and resources to deliver the project. The evaluation criteria will focus on variations or combinations of the following methods:

* CCTV video surveillance systems
* Intrusion alarm systems
* Project management and technical expertise
